DOC.brief_summary: This extension study design evaluate long-term safety , tolerability , efficacy fingolimod ( FTY720 ) patient multiple sclerosis . The Extension study extension 24-month Core study ( CFTY720D2301/NCT00289978 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Efficacy Safety Fingolimod ( FTY720 ) Patients With Relapsing-remitting Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Patients complete 24 month core study Patients chronic disease immune system , malignancy , acute pulmonary disease , cardiac failure , etc . Pregnant nursing woman Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
